This multicentre , prospective , randomize control clinical trial design evaluate postoperative delirium general anesthesia regional anesthesia elderly patient undergo hip fracture surgery . Our research hypotheses : ( 1 ) regional anesthesia may contribute decrease incidence postoperative delirium . ( 2 ) Regional anesthesia may improve outcome elderly patient reduce healthcare cost associate postoperative delirium . ( 3 ) Postoperative delirium may result poor long-term functional outcome .
